name: ORB!T
description:
Guide your ship into orbit!

X to gain momentum, Z to lose momentum.  Staying in the target orbit for 300 frames to get points.  Larger orbits grant more points.  Complete 5 orbits to win.

HINTS: Achieving a stable orbit is hard!  Apply momentum (x) at the height of an orbit or decreasing momentum (z) when the orbiter is nearest to the planet will help manage orbital eccentricity. Try using a light touch when applying forces.

made for Tweet Tweet Jam 5
